備.definition: (bound form) to prepare; to equip; (literary) fully; completely

備下.definition: to prepare; to arrange (sth to be offered)

備取.definition: to be on the waiting list (for admission to a school)

備品.definition: machine parts or tools kept in reserve; spare parts

備嘗艱苦.definition: see 備嘗辛苦|备尝辛苦[bei4chang2-xin1ku3]

備嘗辛苦.definition: (idiom) to have suffered all kinds of hardships

備孕.definition: to be trying to get pregnant

備悉.definition: to know all about; to be informed of all the details

備戰.definition: prepared against war; to prepare for war; warmongering

備抵.definition: an allowance; to allow for (a drop in value) (accountancy)

備料.definition: to get the materials ready; to prepare feed (for livestock)

備案.definition: to put on record; to file

備用二級頭呼吸器.pinyin: bei4 yong4 er4 ji2 tou2 hu1 xi1 qi4

備皮.definition: to prep a patient's skin prior to surgery (shaving hair, cleansing etc)

備考.definition: to prepare for an exam; (of an appendix, note etc) for reference

備而不用.definition: have sth ready just in case; keep sth for possible future use

備耕.definition: to make preparations for plowing and sowing

備至.definition: to the utmost; in every possible way

備註.definition: remarks column (abbr. for 備註欄|备注栏[bei4 zhu4 lan2]); remarks; notes (written in such a column)

備課.definition: (of a teacher) to do one's lesson preparation

備辦.definition: to provide (items for an event); to cater; to make preparations

備降.definition: (aviation) to land at an alternate airport
